title: Catholic Charities
description: Offers vital support, including food, shelter, education, counseling, and emergency assistance, reaching tens of thousands of individuals annually.

title: Colorado Coalition for the Homeless
description: Offers vital support, including food, shelter, education, counseling, and emergency assistance, reaching tens of thousands of individuals annually.

title: Jewish Family Service
description: A nonprofit organization providing human services to all, regardless of circumstances or beliefs, promoting community-wide impact through shared responsibility.

title: Lawrence Street Community Center
description: Provides safe daytime shelter for homeless individuals in Denver, away from street dangers

title: New Life Program
description: One year immersive program that includes housing, bible study, education, counseling, life skills development, and work readiness

title: The Delores Project
description: The Delores Project works alongside individuals as they overcome barriers and challenges; providing shelter, housing, and supportive services,

title: The Denver Rescue Mission
description: Provides emergency services, rehabilitation, transitional programs, and community outreach to individuals experiencing homelessness and addiction

title: The Denver Samaritan House Overnight Shelter
description: Samaritan House offers overnight shelter every day from 5 p.m. to 7:30 a.m., providing 40 dorm-style beds on a first-come, first-served basis. Services include two meals and bathroom facilities. Open to women aged 18 and older, admission is at 2301 Lawrence St. in Denver by 5 p.m., with no need for prior arrangements or referrals.

title: The HOPE Program
description: HOPE provides a safe and inclusive day shelter for homeless individuals living with HIV, fostering community, growth, and prioritizing health.

title: Housing Connector
description: Housing Connector is a tech-for-good nonprofit that increases access to housing for individuals most in need. We do this by solving financial and residen challenges for property managers so they can open doors to more people in the community, and by streamliningthe housing search experience for services providers with our Zillow powered marketplace.
